document_data.name: Thava
document_data.Description: Thava had golden eyes and ocher scales dulled in gold. She was tall and bulky, and because of that she was often confused as a male.
document_data.Equipment: Thava wore a white [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[plate mail]] and carried an [[axe]].
document_data.History: She was an old friend of the [[monk]] [[Kwan Shang-Li]] and the [[tiefling]] [[Iados]]. In [[1479 DR]], Kwan Shang-Li recruited her in to aid him to fight the [[eladrin]] [[vampire]] [[Caelynna]].
